fields.name: Description
fields.description: User friendly description of the parameter

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The parameter name that the script will expect a parameter value for

fields.name: Optional
fields.description: Is this parameter required or optional

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of parameter the script is expecting. psCredential is a PSCredentialObject

fields.name: Visibility
fields.description: Should this parameter be visible to arm and passed in the parameters argument when executing
